metadata.creator: Sergio Contreras
metadata.description: This episode has a general theme of Christmas and the clips are focused on a Christmas program of the school Gabriela Mistral. The episode shows a variety of art work and cultural dances performed by the students of this spanish school. The second part of the episode is a concert performed by a group from Nicaragua named B-Cuadro.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros.
